dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4115946W] RE: 66.98.252.56 - Hosting Illegal Software
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

Software

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Abuse Team for Ev1Servers, 
 
Your client hosted on Server IP 66.98.252.56 ,  
http://66.98.252.56/~adamsstr/mail/ 
 
Has installed our software "Socketmail" after doing a chrage-back  
(apparently fraud). We have contacted him several times to remove the  
software , without success. Please contact him and have him remove our  
script / software from your server. 
 
We have notified him via email that he has 48 hours to remove it (it is
now  
42 hours), before we take legal action - this however, means the main
server  
hosts (Ev1servers) would then be liable for hosting illegal software. We

hope you can take care of this issue and have the software removed from
your  
clients server. 
 
Regards, 
Shivam 
 
Socketmail Team 
 
 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
